name: IT 201 Sprint 2 - Marlon Egoavil
description:
This application spawns blockmen by left clicking. The default color of these blockmen is blue. These spawned blockmen can be changed by using the UI features on the left side. You can even randomly spawn blockmen at random positions at a time delay of your choice. There is also a clock to tell time and its behavior can also be changed by the UI features underneath the clock.

Feature 1 - Continuous Toggle (Left click to change from continuous to discrete)

Feature 2 - Clock Behavior Dropdown menu (Left click to display options, and left click to set option)

Feature 3 - Random Spawn Toggle (Left click to turn on/off  spawning of blockmen at random positions)

Feature 4 - Speed Slider (Left drag to change timed delay between each spawning of blockmen at random positions if random spawn toggle is on)

Feature 5 - Random Color Button (Left click to change the color of block men to a random color)
